mil6.3.12:1.1_1: atthi so padeso puratthimāya vā disāya dakkhiṇāya vā disāya pacchimāya vā disāya uttarāya vā disāya uddhaṁ vā adho vā tiriyaṁ vā,
mil6.3.12:1.2_1: so padeso puratthimāya vā disāya dakkhiṇāya vā disāya pacchimāya vā disāya uttarāya vā disāya uddhaṁ vā adho vā tiriyaṁ vā,
mil6.3.12:2.1_1: natthi nibbānassa sannihitokāso, tena hi natthi nibbānaṁ?
mil6.3.12:2.2_0: Yesañca taṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikataṁ, tesampi sacchikiriyā micchā, kāraṇaṁ tattha vakkhāmi.
mil6.3.12:2.3_1: mahiyā dhaññuṭṭhānaṁ khettaṁ atthi, gandhuṭṭhānaṁ pupphaṁ atthi, pupphuṭṭhānaṁ gumbo atthi, phaluṭṭhānaṁ rukkho atthi, ratanuṭṭhānaṁ ākaro atthi,
mil6.3.12:2.3_2: tattha yo koci yaṁ yaṁ icchati,
mil6.3.12:2.3_3: so tattha gantvā taṁ taṁ harati;
mil6.3.12:2.4_0: evameva kho, bhante nāgasena, yadi nibbānaṁ atthi,
mil6.3.12:2.4_1: tassa nibbānassa uṭṭhānokāsopi icchitabbo, yasmā ca kho, bhante nāgasena,
mil6.3.12:3.1_0: “Natthi, mahārāja, nibbānassa sannihitokāso, atthi cetaṁ nibbānaṁ,
mil6.3.12:3.2_0: Yathā pana, mahārāja, atthi aggi nāma, natthi tassa sannihitokāso,
mil6.3.12:3.3_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, atthi nibbānaṁ, natthi tassa sannihitokāso,
mil6.3.12:4.1_0: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, atthi satta ratanāni nāma.
mil6.3.12:4.3_0: cakkaratanaṁ hatthiratanaṁ assaratanaṁ maṇiratanaṁ itthiratanaṁ gahapatiratanaṁ pariṇāyakaratanaṁ.
mil6.3.12:4.4_0: Na ca tesaṁ ratanānaṁ sannihitokāso atthi,
mil6.3.12:4.4_1: khattiyassa pana sammāpaṭipannassa paṭipattibalena tāni ratanāni upagacchanti.
mil6.3.12:4.5_0: Evameva kho, mahārāja, atthi nibbānaṁ, natthi tassa sannihitokāso,
mil6.3.12:5.1_1: nibbānassa sannihitokāso mā hotu, atthi pana taṁ ṭhānaṁ,
mil6.3.12:6.2_1: sīle patiṭṭhito yoniso manasikaronto sakkayavanepi cīnavilātepi alasandepi nigumbepi kāsikosalepi kasmīrepi gandhārepi nagamuddhanipi brahmalokepi yattha katthacipi ṭhito sammāpaṭipanno nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.12:6.3_1: yo koci cakkhumā puriso sakayavanepi cīnavilātepi alasandepi nigumbepi kāsikosalepi kasmīrepi gandhārepi nagamuddhanipi brahmalokepi yattha katthacipi ṭhito ākāsaṁ passati;
mil6.3.12:6.5_0: yattha katthacipi ṭhito sammāpaṭipanno nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti.
mil6.3.12:7.4_0: yattha katthacipi ṭhitassa sammāpaṭipannassa atthi nibbānasacchikiriyā”ti.
mil6.3.12:7.5_0: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, desitaṁ tayā nibbānaṁ, desitā nibbānasacchikiriyā, parikkhatā sīlaguṇā, dassitā sammāpaṭipatti, ussāpito dhammaddhajo, saṇṭhapitā dhammanetti,
